alert.note: Alert for Bennett County Area; Mellette and Todd Counties; Tripp County (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 14 at 1:35PM MDT until March 15 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT TUESDAY AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 333, 334, AND 335... .Tuesday will be mild and dry, with highs in the 60s and lower 70s, and minimum relative humidity near 15 percent. With very dry fuels and gusty southwesterly winds, critical fire weather conditions may result. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT TUESDAY AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 333, 334, AND 335... The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a Fire Weather Watch for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect Tuesday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 333 Bennett County Area, 334 Mellette and Todd Counties and 335 Tripp County. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 17 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity would produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A fire weather watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.

area.areaDesc: Bennett County Area; Mellette and Todd Counties; Tripp County
